relproducts.title: Rimini Black - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: The rimini in black is a classic jet black, rich in both depth and clarity of colour. Yet the fabric is still lightweight enough that it won't block out all of the light from the great outdoors. Ideal for an upstairs bedroom where a good night sleep is a must, the rimini black can serve as a bold new take on a coloured feature wall, or alternatively can be coupled and offset with a range of off-whites and greys to provide a very sleek and modern feel to a bedroom.

relproducts.description: Their stockholm duck egg roller blind is a beautiful light blue, green colour. So subtle in colour it works perfectly with natural and wooden tones throughout the home. The fabric is moisture restitance making it a 'go to' for kitchens and bathrooms. This lovely, blue blind also comes with 5 year guarantee as standard, giving you peace of mind that you blind is built to last. The rimini black is perfect for any bedroom where the sole aim is the best nights sleep possible. Not one for the faint-hearted, this blind will make a statement in whichever room it's used, giving a particularly sleek yet moody look to any living room or dining room.

relproducts.title: Origin Black - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: Don't be put off by the colour black's reputation; the origin in black is much more versatile, and can be far less moody, than you might think.
